reason: Node 1.7.6 has no declared dependencies, but logically depends on all prior siblings 1.7.1-1.7.5 (particularly 1.7.4 for the formula and 1.7.5 for measure-theoretic justification). Recommend declaring dependencies on at least 1.7.4 and 1.7.5. This is a bookkeeping issue and does not affect correctness.
